Package server.request

Class Request.StatusLine

java.lang.Object
server.request.Request.StatusLine
Enclosing class:
Request
public static class Request.StatusLine extends Object
Represents the status line of an HTTP requests, which is the first line in the request. It contains the request method, url, and protocol
Version:
1.0 - May 21st 2023
Author:
Harry Xu

  • Constructor Details

    • StatusLine

      public StatusLine(RequestMethod method, String url, String protocol)
      Constructs a status line with a method, url, and protocol
      Parameters:
      method - the request method
      url - the full url of the request
      protocol - the protocol of the request

  • Method Details

    • populateRequestParams

      public void populateRequestParams(URL url, String route)
      populateRequestParams populates the request params of the request given the URL it has matched with
      Parameters:
      url - the url to populate the request param keys from
      route - the actual visited route to retrieve the request param values from
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the routes do not match. They should be checked for matching with url.matches() first

    • getRouteParams

      public Map<String,String> getRouteParams()
      getRouteParams gets the route parameters in a map
      Returns:
      the route parameters
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the request parameters have not been populated before invoking this method
